mean_en: a type of food made from grains of maize (corn ) that are heated until they burst, forming light whitish balls that are then covered with salt or sugar
sentence: I can't watch a movie without a fresh tub of popcorn.
sentence_trans: 我看电影时不能没有一桶刚出炉的爆米花。
word_etyma: pop爆开 + corn玉米 → popcorn爆米花
